mitigation_description: In order to improve the retention of local workforce, it is recommended to ensure the presence of Greenlandic speaking HR staff, and includes role counseling services to help the workers to develop personal and group strategies to solve interpersonal conflicts and overcome difficulties adapting to the working and life condition.
citation: NAGrontmij A/S (2013) Social Impact Assessment for the ISUA Iron Ore Project for London Mining Greenland A/S. https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf

impact.description: 20% of local workers from the first 5 years of operation
comment: From the first 5 years of the operation phase estimated a workforce of approximately 20%local workers at ISUA, mainly for non-mining processing jobs during the first 5 years.
mitigation_description: Set up a program for intercultural understanding, to be provided to all the workforce and contractors. The program could consist of, for example: i) a course to enhance the understanding of Greenlandic culture and communications codes, mandatory to all international staff, contractors and subcontractors to operate in Greenland; ii) introductory course on rules and expectations related to behaviour and communication during working hours; including explanation on why the rules are established as such iii) workforce workshops for elaboration of social rules during free time activities and common relaxation areas, etc. iv) regular events for encouraging intercultural dialogue and understanding. The program should include monitoring of internal communication or behavioural conflicts and good experiences, in order to ensure regular feedback and improvement of the program.
citation: NAGrontmij A/S (2013) Social Impact Assessment for the ISUA Iron Ore Project for London Mining Greenland A/S. https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf

mitigation_description: Maintain regular contact with the Greenlandic Employers’ Associations, keeping them abreast of upcoming opportunities and discussing solutions and alternatives to potential challenges for the local companies to access business opportunities during the construction and operation phases. impact.description: Indirect business opportunities potentially created or enhanced by the project such as private primary education and day care services, Private health services, Private English-Greenlandic courses, Private counselling
mitigation_description: Preferential purchase of local goods and services to the mine camp operation regarding communication, logistical and support services.
citation: NAGrontmij A/S (2013) Social Impact Assessment for the ISUA Iron Ore Project for London Mining Greenland A/S. https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf

impact.description: Indirect business opportunities potentially created or enhanced by the project such as private primary education and day care services, Private health services, Private English-Greenlandic courses, Private counselling
mitigation_description: Inform Tourist Council and Municipal authorities on the expected requirements of hotels and temporary housing for each year.

impact.description: Indirect business opportunities potentially created or enhanced by the project such as private primary education and day care services, Private health services, Private English-Greenlandic courses, Private counselling
mitigation_description: Requirement in contract with the providers of catering services to supply local/traditional food
citation: NAGrontmij A/S (2013) Social Impact Assessment for the ISUA Iron Ore Project for London Mining Greenland A/S. https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf

impact.description: Indirect business opportunities potentially created or enhanced by the project such as private primary education and day care services, Private health services, Private English-Greenlandic courses, Private counselling
mitigation_description: Engaging the professional hunters in Kapisillit and Nuuk in providing some of the regular Greenlandic food for the canteen and camp in general
citation: NAGrontmij A/S (2013) Social Impact Assessment for the ISUA Iron Ore Project for London Mining Greenland A/S. https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf

impact.description: Competition for human resources in the construction sector
mitigation_description: NA
citation: NAGrontmij A/S (2013) Social Impact Assessment for the ISUA Iron Ore Project for London Mining Greenland A/S. https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf

impact.description:
Potential synergies identified so far
• Increasing volume of business opportunities for the on shore business and construction sectors
• Positive synergy within other oil and mining projects
• Positive synergy with tourism activities and spare time services and goods
mitigation_description: NA
citation: NAGrontmij A/S (2013) Social Impact Assessment for the ISUA Iron Ore Project for London Mining Greenland A/S. https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf

impact.description:
Conflicts identified so far
• Competition for qualified workers, including risk of attracting the most qualified and experienced people from the public sector,
• Cumulative environmental impacts, in case of approval of other mining projects (small scale and large scale).
mitigation_description: NA
citation: NAGrontmij A/S (2013) Social Impact Assessment for the ISUA Iron Ore Project for London Mining Greenland A/S. https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf

impact.description: Prohibition of hunting close to construction areas and camps.
mitigation_description: Strict enforcement of prohibition of all hunting activities for foreign staff, contractors and subcontractors involved in the project both within and outside working hours, during all phases of the project.
citation: NAGrontmij A/S (2013) Social Impact Assessment for the ISUA Iron Ore Project for London Mining Greenland A/S. https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf

impact.description: Prohibition of hunting close to construction areas and camps.
mitigation_description: As per EIA, strict implementation of mitigation measures for preventing or reducing impact on caribou due to disturbances created by project activities during construction and operation, as well as potential barriers due to project Infrastructures.
citation: NAGrontmij A/S (2013) Social Impact Assessment for the ISUA Iron Ore Project for London Mining Greenland A/S. https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf

impact.description: Prohibition of hunting close to construction areas and camps.
mitigation_description: In coordination with national authorities, establish exclusion areas during construction and operation, where hunting and fishing activities are not allowed due to safety and security reasons for the hunters, the staff and project Infrastructures.
citation: NAGrontmij A/S (2013) Social Impact Assessment for the ISUA Iron Ore Project for London Mining Greenland A/S. https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf

impact.description: Prohibition of hunting close to construction areas and camps.
mitigation_description: As per EIA, establish a monitoring plan to register and study changes in the caribou population of the area. Moreover perform annual monitoring of hunting and other traditional livelihood activities in the project area, in collaboration with KNAPK.
citation: NAGrontmij A/S (2013) Social Impact Assessment for the ISUA Iron Ore Project for London Mining Greenland A/S. https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf

impact.description: Prohibition of hunting close to construction areas and camps.
mitigation_description: Provide initial and regular information and explanations about the exclusion areas to the professional fishermen and hunters through their organization, KNAPK, as well as to recreational hunters through public media, meetings, pamphlets, etc. Coordinate with local authorities for reinforcing the information campaigns when licenses are renewed, etc.
citation: NAGrontmij A/S (2013) Social Impact Assessment for the ISUA Iron Ore Project for London Mining Greenland A/S. https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf

impact.description: Prohibition of hunting close to construction areas and camps.
mitigation_description: During construction and operation, make formal agreements with local fishermen and hunters for the provision of fish and meat for the camps, directly or through the catering/canteen service.
citation: NAGrontmij A/S (2013) Social Impact Assessment for the ISUA Iron Ore Project for London Mining Greenland A/S. https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf

impact.description: Prohibition of hunting close to construction areas and camps.
mitigation_description: Promote consumption and sales of locally produced food, handicrafts and seal skin products among international staff, providers and consultants.
citation: NAGrontmij A/S (2013) Social Impact Assessment for the ISUA Iron Ore Project for London Mining Greenland A/S. https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf

impact.description: Prohibition of hunting close to construction areas and camps.
mitigation_description: Continue the presence of representatives of KNAPK in the consultation committee of the project.
citation: NAGrontmij A/S (2013) Social Impact Assessment for the ISUA Iron Ore Project for London Mining Greenland A/S. https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf

impact.description: Prohibition of hunting close to construction areas and camps.
mitigation_description: As seal hunting is commonly a secondary activity of fishing, the amount of caught seals declared during the study may indicate that fishing activities with small boats is an activity more widespread and significant than originally expected. It is therefore recommended to perform a quantitative study and mapping of professional and recreational fishing in the waters along the Akia/Nordlandet area.
citation: NAGrontmij A/S (2013) Social Impact Assessment for the ISUA Iron Ore Project for London Mining Greenland A/S. https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf

impact.description: Prohibition of hunting close to construction areas and camps.
mitigation_description: Annually cross check monitoring environmental information with impacts on performance and hunting/fishing areas for both professionals and recreational hunters.
citation: NAGrontmij A/S (2013) Social Impact Assessment for the ISUA Iron Ore Project for London Mining Greenland A/S. https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf

citation: NAGrontmij A/S (2013) Social Impact Assessment for the ISUA Iron Ore Project for London Mining Greenland A/S. https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf

impact.description: Prohibition of hunting in areas close to project Infrastructures for safety reasons.
mitigation_description: In coordination with national authorities, establish exclusion areas during construction and operation, where hunting and fishing activities are not allowed due to safety and security reasons for the hunters, the staff and project Infrastructures.
citation: NAGrontmij A/S (2013) Social Impact Assessment for the ISUA Iron Ore Project for London Mining Greenland A/S. https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf

impact.description: Prohibition of hunting in areas close to project Infrastructures for safety reasons.
mitigation_description: As per EIA, establish a monitoring plan to register and study changes in the caribou population of the area. Moreover perform annual monitoring of hunting and other traditional livelihood activities in the project area, in collaboration with KNAPK.
citation: NAGrontmij A/S (2013) Social Impact Assessment for the ISUA Iron Ore Project for London Mining Greenland A/S. https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf

impact.description: Prohibition of hunting in areas close to project Infrastructures for safety reasons.
mitigation_description: Provide initial and regular information and explanations about the exclusion areas to the professional fishermen and hunters through their organization, KNAPK, as well as to recreational hunters through public media, meetings, pamphlets, etc. Coordinate with local authorities for reinforcing the information campaigns when licenses are renewed, etc.
citation: NAGrontmij A/S (2013) Social Impact Assessment for the ISUA Iron Ore Project for London Mining Greenland A/S. https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf

impact.description: Prohibition of hunting in areas close to project Infrastructures for safety reasons.
mitigation_description: During construction and operation, make formal agreements with local fishermen and hunters for the provision of fish and meat for the camps, directly or through the catering/canteen service.
citation: NAGrontmij A/S (2013) Social Impact Assessment for the ISUA Iron Ore Project for London Mining Greenland A/S. https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf

impact.description: Prohibition of hunting in areas close to project Infrastructures for safety reasons.
mitigation_description: Promote consumption and sales of locally produced food, handicrafts and seal skin products among international staff, providers and consultants.
citation: NAGrontmij A/S (2013) Social Impact Assessment for the ISUA Iron Ore Project for London Mining Greenland A/S. https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf

impact.description: Prohibition of hunting in areas close to project Infrastructures for safety reasons.
mitigation_description: Continue the presence of representatives of KNAPK in the consultation committee of the project.
citation: NAGrontmij A/S (2013) Social Impact Assessment for the ISUA Iron Ore Project for London Mining Greenland A/S. https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf

impact.description: Prohibition of hunting in areas close to project Infrastructures for safety reasons.
mitigation_description: As seal hunting is commonly a secondary activity of fishing, the amount of caught seals declared during the study may indicate that fishing activities with small boats is an activity more widespread and significant than originally expected. It is therefore recommended to perform a quantitative study and mapping of professional and recreational fishing in the waters along the Akia/Nordlandet area.
citation: NAGrontmij A/S (2013) Social Impact Assessment for the ISUA Iron Ore Project for London Mining Greenland A/S. https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf

impact.description: Prohibition of hunting in areas close to project Infrastructures for safety reasons.
mitigation_description: Annually cross check monitoring environmental information with impacts on performance and hunting/fishing areas for both professionals and recreational hunters.
citation: NAGrontmij A/S (2013) Social Impact Assessment for the ISUA Iron Ore Project for London Mining Greenland A/S. https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf

impact.description: Potential reduction in the numbers of caribou shot
mitigation_description: Strict enforcement of prohibition of all hunting activities for foreign staff, contractors and subcontractors involved in the project both within and outside working hours, during all phases of the project.
citation: NAGrontmij A/S (2013) Social Impact Assessment for the ISUA Iron Ore Project for London Mining Greenland A/S. https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf

impact.description: Increased specific capacity for working in the extractive industry for local workers.
mitigation_description: Undertake an assessment of training needs and base on this and the detailed job description, prepare a job training program for the required job categories
citation: NAGrontmij A/S (2013) Social Impact Assessment for the ISUA Iron Ore Project for London Mining Greenland A/S. https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf

impact.description: Increased specific capacity for working in the extractive industry for local workers.
mitigation_description: Actively promote training in English language, for both potential workers as well as for improving the communication skills of local workers, for example offering courses to be taken during their weeks off or after work hours on the site.
citation: NAGrontmij A/S (2013) Social Impact Assessment for the ISUA Iron Ore Project for London Mining Greenland A/S. https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf

impact.description: Increased specific capacity for working in the extractive industry for local workers.
mitigation_description: Involve the School of Minerals and Petroleum in the training and recruitment program.
citation: NAGrontmij A/S (2013) Social Impact Assessment for the ISUA Iron Ore Project for London Mining Greenland A/S. https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf

impact.description: Increased specific capacity for working in the extractive industry for local workers.
mitigation_description: Discuss with the School of Minerals and Petroleum and ARTEK the possibility of adapting the curricula of the basic training courses and the development advanced courses in order to match the needs of ISUA project and other highly mechanised mining operations, and thereby improve employment prospects of new graduates.
citation: NAGrontmij A/S (2013) Social Impact Assessment for the ISUA Iron Ore Project for London Mining Greenland A/S. https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf

impact.description: Increased specific capacity for working in the extractive industry for local workers.
mitigation_description: Discuss with the School of Minerals and Petroleum and ARTEK, INULI and Navigational School the possibility of allocating a number of job positions as apprenticeship positions for advanced students.
citation: NAGrontmij A/S (2013) Social Impact Assessment for the ISUA Iron Ore Project for London Mining Greenland A/S. https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf

impact.description: Increased specific capacity for working in the extractive industry for local workers.
mitigation_description: Development of an on the job-training program for staff on specific duties, safety, etc.
citation: NAGrontmij A/S (2013) Social Impact Assessment for the ISUA Iron Ore Project for London Mining Greenland A/S. https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf

impact.description: Increased specific capacity for working in the extractive industry for local workers.
mitigation_description: Dedicated, locally based Greenlandic speaking Human Resources Manager to develop and follow up on recruitment, training and career development of the staff.
citation: NAGrontmij A/S (2013) Social Impact Assessment for the ISUA Iron Ore Project for London Mining Greenland A/S. https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf

impact.description: Increased specific capacity for working in the extractive industry for local workers.
mitigation_description: Regular evaluation of progress on the training programs and performance of apprentices and local and international staff, in order to continuously optimize the internal training programs and provide feedback to educational institutions.
citation: NAGrontmij A/S (2013) Social Impact Assessment for the ISUA Iron Ore Project for London Mining Greenland A/S. https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf

impact.description: Pressure on administration of municipal permits for the construction phase
mitigation_description:
Establish cooperation with Sermersooq Municipality as soon as possible, in order to clarify the following aspects:
• Estimation of housing demand for the project during construction and operation
• Alternative plans for short term and long term housing for staff and their families in Nuuk
• Project needs related to treatment and final disposition of certain types of wastes, and solutions acceptable for the Municipality
• Plan for use of port facilities and dock space in the port of Nuuk.
• ISUA Project plan for submission of request for construction permits, so the Municipality can better organize its work.
citation: NAGrontmij A/S (2013) Social Impact Assessment for the ISUA Iron Ore Project for London Mining Greenland A/S. https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf

impact.description: Pressure on administration of municipal permits for the construction phase
mitigation_description: Avoid in all cases municipal housing and use private rental
citation: NAGrontmij A/S (2013) Social Impact Assessment for the ISUA Iron Ore Project for London Mining Greenland A/S. https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf

impact.description: Pressure on administration of municipal permits for the construction phase
mitigation_description: For short term accommodation in Nuuk consider a framework contract with the local hotels and temporary rented accommodation facilities where expected services and approximated time plan will be specified
citation: NAGrontmij A/S (2013) Social Impact Assessment for the ISUA Iron Ore Project for London Mining Greenland A/S. https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf

impact.description: Pressure on administration of municipal permits for the construction phase
mitigation_description: Assess the type and quantity of waste potentially produced and consider alternative waste treatment solutions. Minimize shipping of domestic wastes for treatment to the facilities in Nuuk during construction. Promote development of new and innovative waste recycling/reuse local business.
citation: NAGrontmij A/S (2013) Social Impact Assessment for the ISUA Iron Ore Project for London Mining Greenland A/S. https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf

impact.description: Pressure on administration of municipal permits for the construction phase
mitigation_description: Transboundary transport of hazardous waste may create additional unwanted risks. impact.description:
The needs of the project will have implications on key aspects of the local provision of services and development in Sermersooq Municipality, in particular on:
• Housing
• Air traffic in Nuuk Airport
• Maritime freight traffic, both directly and indirectly related to the project
• Treatment of hazardous and special fractions of waste

impact.description: Approximately 1000 to 3000 temporary international workers, mostly male, expected for a period of 3 years
mitigation_description: Monitoring of the demographic changes taking place in Nuuk, e.g. the number and profile of international staff locating in Nuuk , number of Greenlandic immigrants, both workers and their families..
citation: NAGrontmij A/S (2013) Social Impact Assessment for the ISUA Iron Ore Project for London Mining Greenland A/S. https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf

impact.description: Approximately 1000 to 3000 temporary international workers, mostly male, expected for a period of 3 years
mitigation_description: Implementation of a Grievance Mechanism for the project, according to IMF standards and best practices of the mining industry, to be operational from beginning of the construction phase. Citizens should be able to express verbal or written complaints in Greenlandic, Danish or English related to grievances caused by or related to project activities, the project staff, its consultants or contractors. Procedures for reporting the complaint should be widely communicated. Duration of the resolution process and how disagreements will be resolved must be clearly explained.
citation: NAGrontmij A/S (2013) Social Impact Assessment for the ISUA Iron Ore Project for London Mining Greenland A/S. https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf

impact.description: Approximately 1000 to 3000 temporary international workers, mostly male, expected for a period of 3 years
mitigation_description: A Grievance mechanism will help in the identification of social conflicts that were not predicted or expected, as well as prevent conflicts from escalating by providing speedy and acceptable resolutions.
citation: NAGrontmij A/S (2013) Social Impact Assessment for the ISUA Iron Ore Project for London Mining Greenland A/S. https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf

impact.description: Approximately 1000 to 3000 temporary international workers, mostly male, expected for a period of 3 years
mitigation_description: Monitoring of workers actually visiting Nuuk during their days off and the percentage of workers that extend their stay in Greenland beyond the construction period needs to be monitored in coordination with the Greenland authorities to fully assess the real impact.
citation: NAGrontmij A/S (2013) Social Impact Assessment for the ISUA Iron Ore Project for London Mining Greenland A/S. https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf

impact.description: Approximately 1000 to 3000 temporary international workers, mostly male, expected for a period of 3 years
mitigation_description: It is recommended that measures are taken to prevent risks stemming from the high number of international workers during construction, including facilitation of access to Nuuk, awareness raising activities related to sexual behaviour and understanding of the Greenlandic culture and way of life.
citation: NAGrontmij A/S (2013) Social Impact Assessment for the ISUA Iron Ore Project for London Mining Greenland A/S. https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf

impact.description: Approximately 1000 to 3000 temporary international workers, mostly male, expected for a period of 3 years
mitigation_description: It is not expected that a significant number of construction workers will choose to spend their one free day per week in Nuuk. Nevertheless, if this proves otherwise, measures should be taken to regulate the amount of workers in town simultaneously.
citation: NAGrontmij A/S (2013) Social Impact Assessment for the ISUA Iron Ore Project for London Mining Greenland A/S. https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf

impact.description: Approximately 1000 to 3000 temporary international workers, mostly male, expected for a period of 3 years
mitigation_description: Awareness raising and team building activities should be planned at the camp with the intention of creating intercultural understanding and respect among workers of different nationalities including providing international staff with a basic understanding of Greenlandic culture, etiquette and basic vocabulary.
citation: NAGrontmij A/S (2013) Social Impact Assessment for the ISUA Iron Ore Project for London Mining Greenland A/S. https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf

impact.description: Approximately 1000 to 3000 temporary international workers, mostly male, expected for a period of 3 years
mitigation_description: Furthermore, contracts with suppliers should reflect measures for the prevention of risks for social conflict.
citation: NAGrontmij A/S (2013) Social Impact Assessment for the ISUA Iron Ore Project for London Mining Greenland A/S. https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf

citation: NAGrontmij A/S (2013) Social Impact Assessment for the ISUA Iron Ore Project for London Mining Greenland A/S. https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf

impact.description: Risk of installation of prostitution
mitigation_description: Monitoring of workers actually visiting Nuuk during their days off and the percentage of workers that extend their stay in Greenland beyond the construction period needs to be monitored in coordination with the Greenland authorities to fully assess the real impact.
citation: NAGrontmij A/S (2013) Social Impact Assessment for the ISUA Iron Ore Project for London Mining Greenland A/S. https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf

impact.description: Risk of installation of prostitution
mitigation_description: It is recommended that measures are taken to prevent risks stemming from the high number of international workers during construction, including facilitation of access to Nuuk, awareness raising activities related to sexual behaviour and understanding of the Greenlandic culture and way of life.
citation: NAGrontmij A/S (2013) Social Impact Assessment for the ISUA Iron Ore Project for London Mining Greenland A/S. https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf

impact.description: Risk of installation of prostitution
mitigation_description: It is not expected that a significant number of construction workers will choose to spend their one free day per week in Nuuk. Nevertheless, if this proves otherwise, measures should be taken to regulate the amount of workers in town simultaneously.
citation: NAGrontmij A/S (2013) Social Impact Assessment for the ISUA Iron Ore Project for London Mining Greenland A/S. https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf

impact.description: Risk of installation of prostitution
mitigation_description: Awareness raising and team building activities should be planned at the camp with the intention of creating intercultural understanding and respect among workers of different nationalities including providing international staff with a basic understanding of Greenlandic culture, etiquette and basic vocabulary.
citation: NAGrontmij A/S (2013) Social Impact Assessment for the ISUA Iron Ore Project for London Mining Greenland A/S. https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf

mitigation_description: Furthermore, contracts with suppliers should reflect measures for the prevention of risks for social conflict.

impact.description: Risk of increase of unwanted pregnancies and aborts
mitigation_description: Monitoring of the demographic changes taking place in Nuuk, e.g. the number and profile of international staff locating in Nuuk , number of Greenlandic immigrants, both workers and their families..
citation: NAGrontmij A/S (2013) Social Impact Assessment for the ISUA Iron Ore Project for London Mining Greenland A/S. https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf

impact.description: Risk of increase of unwanted pregnancies and aborts
mitigation_description: Implementation of a Grievance Mechanism for the project, according to IMF standards and best practices of the mining industry, to be operational from beginning of the construction phase. Citizens should be able to express verbal or written complaints in Greenlandic, Danish or English related to grievances caused by or related to project activities, the project staff, its consultants or contractors. Procedures for reporting the complaint should be widely communicated. Duration of the resolution process and how disagreements will be resolved must be clearly explained.
citation: NAGrontmij A/S (2013) Social Impact Assessment for the ISUA Iron Ore Project for London Mining Greenland A/S. https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf

impact.description: Expected reduction on emigration of Greenlanders.
mitigation_description: Bi-annual review of grievances reported and solutions provided. Number of grievances received and %of them satisfactory resolved reported in Sustainability annual reports.
citation: NAGrontmij A/S (2013) Social Impact Assessment for the ISUA Iron Ore Project for London Mining Greenland A/S. https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf

impact.description: Expected reduction on emigration of Greenlanders.
mitigation_description: Number of workers that extend their stay in Greenland beyond the contract period to be monitored in coordination with the Greenland authorities to fully assess the real impact.
citation: NAGrontmij A/S (2013) Social Impact Assessment for the ISUA Iron Ore Project for London Mining Greenland A/S. https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf

impact.description: Expected reduction on emigration of Greenlanders.
mitigation_description: Annually revisit and monitor social indicators related to population numbers and profile, unemployment, cost of living, pressure on housing, perception of well-being, unwanted pregnancies, teenage pregnancies, STDs, TB, and HIV level. This monitoring information will allow an early “alarm bell” if demographic changes and social problems are larger than or differ from predictions.
citation: NAGrontmij A/S (2013) Social Impact Assessment for the ISUA Iron Ore Project for London Mining Greenland A/S. https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf

impact.description: Expected reduction on emigration of Greenlanders.
mitigation_description: Coordinate with local authorities the selection and monitoring of indicators of social wellbeing for the vulnerable groups, as well as support initiatives and policies to protect and support vulnerable children and their families.
citation: NAGrontmij A/S (2013) Social Impact Assessment for the ISUA Iron Ore Project for London Mining Greenland A/S. https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf

impact.description: Expected reduction on emigration of Greenlanders.
mitigation_description: Awareness raising and team building activities should be planned at the camp with the intention of creating intercultural understanding and respect among workers of different nationalities including providing international staff with a basic understanding of Greenlandic culture and language. This should be repeated twice a year to ensure that new staff is integrated and understanding reinforced.
citation: NAGrontmij A/S (2013) Social Impact Assessment for the ISUA Iron Ore Project for London Mining Greenland A/S. https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf

impact.description: Expected reduction on emigration of Greenlanders.

impact.description: Expected reduction on emigration of Greenlanders.
mitigation_description: Free or subsidised alcohol counselling for the local workers or their families can play an important role both in retention of local workforce and prevention of social problems related to increase of substance abuse trigged by changes in life style and family situation. These efforts can be coordinated with public health programs (PAARISA) and specialised local organizations.
citation: NAGrontmij A/S (2013) Social Impact Assessment for the ISUA Iron Ore Project for London Mining Greenland A/S. https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf

impact.description: Expected reduction on emigration of Greenlanders.
mitigation_description: It is recommended to support national early pregnancy initiatives from Paarisa and health authorities.
citation: NAGrontmij A/S (2013) Social Impact Assessment for the ISUA Iron Ore Project for London Mining Greenland A/S. https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf

mitigation_description:

citation: NAGrontmij A/S (2013) Social Impact Assessment for the ISUA Iron Ore Project for London Mining Greenland A/S. https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf

impact.description: Risk of conflict and cultural clash between international workers and local workers employed by the project due to communication or personal problems.
mitigation_description: Number of workers that extend their stay in Greenland beyond the contract period to be monitored in coordination with the Greenland authorities to fully assess the real impact.
citation: NAGrontmij A/S (2013) Social Impact Assessment for the ISUA Iron Ore Project for London Mining Greenland A/S. https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf

impact.description: Risk of conflict and cultural clash between international workers and local workers employed by the project due to communication or personal problems.
mitigation_description: Annually revisit and monitor social indicators related to population numbers and profile, unemployment, cost of living, pressure on housing, perception of well-being, unwanted pregnancies, teenage pregnancies, STDs, TB, and HIV level. This monitoring information will allow an early “alarm bell” if demographic changes and social problems are larger than or differ from predictions.
citation: NAGrontmij A/S (2013) Social Impact Assessment for the ISUA Iron Ore Project for London Mining Greenland A/S. https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf

impact.description: Risk of conflict and cultural clash between international workers and local workers employed by the project due to communication or personal problems.
mitigation_description: Coordinate with local authorities the selection and monitoring of indicators of social wellbeing for the vulnerable groups, as well as support initiatives and policies to protect and support vulnerable children and their families.
citation: NAGrontmij A/S (2013) Social Impact Assessment for the ISUA Iron Ore Project for London Mining Greenland A/S. https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf

impact.description: Risk of conflict and cultural clash between international workers and local workers employed by the project due to communication or personal problems.
mitigation_description: Awareness raising and team building activities should be planned at the camp with the intention of creating intercultural understanding and respect among workers of different nationalities including providing international staff with a basic understanding of Greenlandic culture and language. This should be repeated twice a year to ensure that new staff is integrated and understanding reinforced.
citation: NAGrontmij A/S (2013) Social Impact Assessment for the ISUA Iron Ore Project for London Mining Greenland A/S. https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf

impact.description: Risk of conflict and cultural clash between international workers and local workers employed by the project due to communication or personal problems.
mitigation_description: Contracts with suppliers should reflect measures for the prevention of risks for social conflict.
citation: NAGrontmij A/S (2013) Social Impact Assessment for the ISUA Iron Ore Project for London Mining Greenland A/S. https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf

impact.description: Risk of conflict and cultural clash between international workers and local workers employed by the project due to communication or personal problems.
mitigation_description: Free or subsidised alcohol counselling for the local workers or their families can play an important role both in retention of local workforce and prevention of social problems related to increase of substance abuse trigged by changes in life style and family situation. These efforts can be coordinated with public health programs (PAARISA) and specialised local organizations.
citation: NAGrontmij A/S (2013) Social Impact Assessment for the ISUA Iron Ore Project for London Mining Greenland A/S. https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf

impact.description: Risk of conflict and cultural clash between international workers and local workers employed by the project due to communication or personal problems.
mitigation_description: It is recommended to support national early pregnancy initiatives from Paarisa and health authorities.

impact.description: The potential risks of accidents are associated with workers behaviour/attitude with their working environment as well as lack of instruction or lack of maintenance of equipment.
mitigation_description: Regulations which promote instruction and supervisions in order to reduce the accidents and to focus on a Health/safety working environment
citation: NAGrontmij A/S (2013) Social Impact Assessment for the ISUA Iron Ore Project for London Mining Greenland A/S. https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf

impact.description: The potential risks of accidents are associated with workers behaviour/attitude with their working environment as well as lack of instruction or lack of maintenance of equipment.
mitigation_description: Development and Strict implementation of Health/safety plans and procedures for construction and operation.

impact.description: The potential risks of accidents are associated with workers behaviour/attitude with their working environment as well as lack of instruction or lack of maintenance of equipment.
mitigation_description: Contractual requirements to suppliers and contractors regarding safety measures, response time, etc. in order to minimise risk of accidents, appropriate and timely response in case of accidents, emergency evacuation from mine site, etc.

impact.description: Pressure on public health system due to increased demand on diagnostic and treatment medical services that cannot be provided on site
mitigation_description: All workers and contractors are covered by private health insurances. Services provided by the public system can be refunded as appropriated.
citation: NAGrontmij A/S (2013) Social Impact Assessment for the ISUA Iron Ore Project for London Mining Greenland A/S. https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf

impact.description: Pressure on public health system due to increased demand on diagnostic and treatment medical services that cannot be provided on site
mitigation_description: Develop clear criteria and conditions for use of local health services; communicate these to health providers and assess the need for supplementing capacity where necessary (upgrading of services or Infrastructure, specific training of staff, etc.), in cooperation with local authorities.
citation: NAGrontmij A/S (2013) Social Impact Assessment for the ISUA Iron Ore Project for London Mining Greenland A/S. https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf

impact.description: Pressure on public health system due to increased demand on diagnostic and treatment medical services that cannot be provided on site
mitigation_description: Establish contact with local health service and work out cooperation between both parties.
citation: NAGrontmij A/S (2013) Social Impact Assessment for the ISUA Iron Ore Project for London Mining Greenland A/S. https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf

mitigation_description: Recommended obligatory health screening of workers also during construction phase, as a minimum, screening for transmittable diseases.

impact.description: Increased availability of private dental, physiotherapy services, etc.
mitigation_description: Where feasible, repatriate the affected worker to Island, Denmark or their country of residence.

impact.description: Positive pressure for higher quality in health services in general might influence an upgrading in the quality of health services.
mitigation_description: All workers and contractors are covered by private health insurances. Services provided by the public system can be refunded as appropriated.
citation: NAGrontmij A/S (2013) Social Impact Assessment for the ISUA Iron Ore Project for London Mining Greenland A/S. https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf

impact.description: Positive pressure for higher quality in health services in general might influence an upgrading in the quality of health services.
mitigation_description: Develop clear criteria and conditions for use of local health services; communicate these to health providers and assess the need for supplementing capacity where necessary (upgrading of services or Infrastructure, specific training of staff, etc.), in cooperation with local authorities.
citation: NAGrontmij A/S (2013) Social Impact Assessment for the ISUA Iron Ore Project for London Mining Greenland A/S. https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf

impact.description: Risk of transmission of STIs and tuberculosis, mainly via prostitution and sexual contact with the local population
mitigation_description:
During construction, limited contact with local population due to distance
of the construction camp form Nuuk
and Kapisillit, and accessibility limitation
citation: NAGrontmij A/S (2013) Social Impact Assessment for the ISUA Iron Ore Project for London Mining Greenland A/S. https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf

impact.description: Risk of transmission of STIs and tuberculosis, mainly via prostitution and sexual contact with the local population
mitigation_description: Existing national campaigns to prevent substance abuse, unwanted pregnancies, smoking and STIs and promote healthy diet and exercise
citation: NAGrontmij A/S (2013) Social Impact Assessment for the ISUA Iron Ore Project for London Mining Greenland A/S. https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf

impact.description: Risk of transmission of STIs and tuberculosis, mainly via prostitution and sexual contact with the local population
mitigation_description: FIDIC HIV/AIDS conditions extended to sub contractors in all the tender documents and contracts related to Construction, operation and closure.
citation: NAGrontmij A/S (2013) Social Impact Assessment for the ISUA Iron Ore Project for London Mining Greenland A/S. https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf

impact.description: Risk of transmission of STIs and tuberculosis, mainly via prostitution and sexual contact with the local population
mitigation_description: Promotion and availability of healthy nutrition and physical activity in the mine camps.
citation: NAGrontmij A/S (2013) Social Impact Assessment for the ISUA Iron Ore Project for London Mining Greenland A/S. https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf

impact.description: Risk of transmission of STIs and tuberculosis, mainly via prostitution and sexual contact with the local population
mitigation_description: Initial and regular health checks for employees (screening of TB, Cholesterol, diabetes, etc.).
citation: NAGrontmij A/S (2013) Social Impact Assessment for the ISUA Iron Ore Project for London Mining Greenland A/S. https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf

impact.description: Risk of transmission of STIs and tuberculosis, mainly via prostitution and sexual contact with the local population
mitigation_description: Develop and implement strategies for making healthy choice the easy choice at the mine site: healthy food, local food, attractive and available exercise program, hand washing facilities and campaigns, etc.
citation: NAGrontmij A/S (2013) Social Impact Assessment for the ISUA Iron Ore Project for London Mining Greenland A/S. https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf

impact.description: Risk of transmission of STIs and tuberculosis, mainly via prostitution and sexual contact with the local population
mitigation_description: Counseling services for staff and their families.
citation: NAGrontmij A/S (2013) Social Impact Assessment for the ISUA Iron Ore Project for London Mining Greenland A/S. https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf

impact.description: Risk of transmission of STIs and tuberculosis, mainly via prostitution and sexual contact with the local population
mitigation_description: Active part of community health campaigns (e.g. safe sex, alcohol, non-smoking) both for the staff and the community..
citation: NAGrontmij A/S (2013) Social Impact Assessment for the ISUA Iron Ore Project for London Mining Greenland A/S. https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf

impact.description: Risk of transmission of STIs and tuberculosis, mainly via prostitution and sexual contact with the local population
mitigation_description: It is recommended to annually revisit and monitor social indicators such as population numbers and profile, unemployment, cost of living and perception of well-being, teenage pregnancy, STDs and HIV level. This monitoring information will allow an early “alarm” if demographic changes and social problems are larger than or differ from predictions. This recommendation is also applicable to impacts in social conflicts.
citation: NAGrontmij A/S (2013) Social Impact Assessment for the ISUA Iron Ore Project for London Mining Greenland A/S. https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf

impact.description: Risk of transmission of STIs and tuberculosis, mainly via prostitution and sexual contact with the local population
mitigation_description: It is recommended to support local and national tuberculosis, early pregnancy and HIV/STD prevention initiatives from Paarisa and health authorities.
citation: NAGrontmij A/S (2013) Social Impact Assessment for the ISUA Iron Ore Project for London Mining Greenland A/S. https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf

impact.description: Risk of transmission of STIs and tuberculosis, mainly via prostitution and sexual contact with the local population
mitigation_description: It is also recommended to design and implement information and prevention campaigns for prevention of Tuberculosis, HIV/AIDS and STDs among workers and contractors affected in the project
citation: NAGrontmij A/S (2013) Social Impact Assessment for the ISUA Iron Ore Project for London Mining Greenland A/S. https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf

impact.description: Impact on archaeological sites
mitigation_description: As recommended by the National Museum, if possible avoid sites with cultural remains, keeping a minimum of 20 m around the archaeological structures for preservation
citation: NAGrontmij A/S (2013) Social Impact Assessment for the ISUA Iron Ore Project for London Mining Greenland A/S. https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf

impact.description: Impact on archaeological sites
mitigation_description: Ensure that the three areas of 100 x 100 m at Isukasia proposed for preservation due to its geological uniqueness are not disturbed.
citation: NAGrontmij A/S (2013) Social Impact Assessment for the ISUA Iron Ore Project for London Mining Greenland A/S. https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf

impact.description: Impact on archaeological sites
mitigation_description: It is recommended that the KNAPK and NAPP are informed of all ships going in and out of Nuuk Fjord to the project in a timely manner. It is recommended to send the information to the KNR (Greenland National Radio) of any ship activities for announcement.
citation: NAGrontmij A/S (2013) Social Impact Assessment for the ISUA Iron Ore Project for London Mining Greenland A/S. https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf

impact.description: Impact on archaeological sites
mitigation_description: Inform KNAPK and free time about risk, restriction and alternatives related to hunting around the project Infrastructures, road and pipelines.
